discussion.content: initial auth call to get a token doesnt require a token

D

Almost all calls need tokenisation, but NOT all calls need tokenisation.

Selected Answer: D
Some calls like to the /sys/health endpoint don't require a token.

questions.question_text: Which is not true of Vault tokens?

choices.A: Vault tokens are the core method for authentication in Vault
choices.D: Vault tokens are required for every Vault call
choices.B: Vault tokens are generated by every authentication method login
choices.C: Vault tokens map to information including polices the token holder has, TTL and max usage, metadata, creation and last renewal time, and more

questions.question_text: When using Integrated Storage, which of the following should you do to recover from possible data loss?

discussion.content:
AD


https://developer.hashicorp.com/vault/tutorials/operations/rekeying-and-rotating

In some cases, you may want to re-generate the root key and its key shares. Here are a few examples:

Someone joins or leaves the organization
Security wants to change the number of shares or threshold
Compliance mandates the keys be rotated at a regular interval

Selected Answer: AD
Answer provided is correct.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is a reason to rekey a Vault cluster? (Choose two.)

choices.B: Adding additional Vault nodes to a cluster
choices.D: A compliance mandate to rotate the master key at a regular interval
choices.E: Upgrading Vault Community Edition to Vault Enterprise
choices.A: A keyholder joins or leaves the organization

questions.question_text: What information is required to revoke a Vault lease?

discussion.content:
C

vault lease revoke lease_id

vault lease revoke --help
Usage: vault lease revoke [options] ID

 Revokes secrets by their lease ID. This command can revoke a single secret
 or multiple secrets based on a path-matched prefix.

Selected Answer: C
Revoke commands require the Lease ID.

choices.B: Generates multiple tokens with TTL set to 5 minutes
choices.A: Generates batch tokens with TTL set to 5 minutes

discussion.content:
A

It is the correct one

Selected Answer: A
Only A is true for the configuration in the screenshot.
